commit.title: [stdlib] Consolidate the standard library in its on directory.
commit.message:
[stdlib] Consolidate the standard library in its on directory.

Not sure this is a good idea, however, it brings quite a bit of
uniformity and will allow to build the stdlib with Dune as a regular
library.

Alternatives are a bit cumbersome:

- a fine-grained dependency chain is a bit tricky, and high maintenance,
- a merge mode is not justified enough I think.

I disabled the whitespace fixer as it would break git's renaming
algorithm.

I disabled the whitespace fixer as it would break git's renaming
algorithm.

commit.title: [stdlib] Consolidate the standard library in its on directory.
commit.message:
[stdlib] Consolidate the standard library in its on directory.

Not sure this is a good idea, however, it brings quite a bit of
uniformity and will allow to build the stdlib with Dune as a regular
library.

Alternatives are a bit cumbersome:

- a fine-grained dependency chain is a bit tricky, and high maintenance,
- a merge mode is not justified enough I think.

I disabled the whitespace fixer as it would break git's renaming
algorithm.
